content:
Mike and Laurie Nau Williamsport speak to Luke McCormack graduateecology about growing mushrooms at the Forest Festival on Sunday PERIOD

Advertisement

The grass is always greener on the other side  of Park Avenue that is PERIOD

On Sunday Penn States Arboretum hosted the Pennsylvania Forest Fest the statewide celebration of the International Year of Forests sponsored by the School of Forest Resources PERIOD

Forest Fest was an invitation for everyone to explore and appreciate the natural resources around them in the State College wilderness PERIOD

This is an event for the whole state said Sanford Smith senior lecturer in Forest Resources and Extension Education PERIOD Its a recognition of the fact that we all have this common tie to the forests

Multiple exhibits were present at the forest festival to engage participants in educational activities that related to the forests and wilderness PERIOD

Evan Venice freshmanenvironmental resource management said these exhibits were a chance to learn about the wildnerness and resources around State College PERIOD

Festivities ranged from mushroom and birdwatching walks to horsedrawn carriage rides and tree climbing to display the wilderness PERIOD

Musical performances also added to the exhibits with local bands performing every hour at the festival PERIOD

The familyfriendly setting also included arts and crafts for children PERIOD The artwork was added to a large Forest Fest tree on display in the pavilion for other attendees to observe PERIOD

Though the festival focuses on wilderness Forest Fest attracted more than just students studying in the College of Agricultural Sciences such as Dillon ODonnell PERIOD

Theres a lot of information here ODonnell freshmancivil engineering said PERIOD

You can explore and learn a lot PERIOD I enjoy forests and this is pretty cool. smith said he hoped attendees of the event walked away with a better appreciation of forests and wilderness and the purpose they serve for the Earths environment PERIOD

Smith added there are other ways to get involved for those who werent able to attend the Forest Fest PERIOD

Smith said there are publications and educational programs for people about forests and wilderness through Penn State Extension PERIOD

There are also monthly online webinars that are used to educate and inform the community about forest management and forest preservation in the area Smith said PERIOD

To appreciate the things people enjoy about forests the list is endless Smith said PERIOD
